name: potts.vim
description:
This is the colorscheme I've come up with "over the years".  It assumes for console that
you have the term set for a black background and gray text.  If you switch to a lighter
scheme, it may not be very visible. 

It works pretty well on transparent term windows, better if you can partially shade them.

Sorry it doesn't have a flashy name, but it doesn't seem to have any theme to it.
Screen shots at http://pottsdl.github.com/colors.html
Screen shot of console vim and GUI (Motif) vim.
install_details: Put into your vimfiles colors/ directory.  And :colorscheme potts
